content:
Hosting Q&A sessions on Instagram Live can be a fantastic way to increase engagement, attract new followers, and build a loyal community around your fitness journey. Here are some specific questions you can ask your followers to encourage them to participate and share the event with their friends:

**Pre-Q&A Session Questions:**

1. **What topics do you want to discuss during the Q&A session?** (e.g., workout routines, nutrition tips, motivation, etc.)
2. **What's the biggest challenge you're facing in your fitness journey right now?** (This will help you tailor your Q&A session to address common pain points.)
3. **What's one question you've always wanted to ask a fitness expert, but never had the chance?** (This can help you create a sense of anticipation and curiosity.)

**During the Q&A Session:**

1. **What's your favorite workout routine or exercise?** (Encourages sharing and interaction.)
2. **How do you stay motivated to reach your fitness goals?** (Inspires sharing of personal tips and experiences.)
3. **What's the most commonly asked question you get about fitness, and how do you answer it?** (Fosters engagement and encourages others to share their own experiences.)

**Post-Q&A Session Questions:**

1. **What was your favorite part of the Q&A session?** (Helps you understand what resonated with your audience.)
2. **What topic would you like to see covered in a future Q&A session?** (Encourages feedback and suggestions for future content.)
3. **Who would you like to see as a guest on a future Q&A session?** (Helps you identify potential collaborations or guest appearances.)

**Sharing Incentives:**

1. **Share this post with a friend who would benefit from the Q&A session!**
2. **Tag a friend who has a question about fitness and would love to join the Q&A session!**
3. **Share a screenshot of the Q&A session on your Instagram Story and use a specific hashtag!** (Creates social proof and encourages sharing.)

By asking these questions, you'll encourage your followers to participate, share the event with their friends, and create a sense of community around your fitness journey. Remember to keep your questions engaging, relevant, and easy to answer, and don't forget to promote your Q&A session in advance to attract new followers!
